traits.name: Iron Boots
entries: While moving, the redcap has disadvantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks.

traits.name: Outsize Strength
entries: While grappling, the redcap is considered to be Medium. Also, wielding a heavy weapon doesn't impose disadvantage on its attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The redcap makes three attacks with its wicked sickle.

actions.name: Wicked Sickle
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Ironbound Pursuit
entries: The redcap moves up to its speed to a creature it can see and kicks with its iron boots. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or take 20 (3d10 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.
